verbs.description: In a [ARGM-TMP: recently] [V: disclosed] [ARG1: letter] to special counsel Robert S. Mueller III , President Donald Trump ’s attorneys said the president “ dictated ” his son ’s statement to the New York Times about a June 2016 meeting ...
